ygData.subject: RE: Vampiric embrace or lifetap?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I would prefer if VE was just more effective (sucking more life and going off more often). Thomas ... From: Brian Hook [mailto:bhook@verant.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I would prefer if VE was just more effective (sucking more life and
going off more often).

Thomas

-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Hook [mailto:bhook@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 3:15 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Vampiric embrace or lifetap?


From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>

Let me ask this -- if Vampiric Embrace was replaced with a Lifetap, would
that be considered an improvement?

Brian
